Name: The Supreme Gunslinger!
Description:
A challenge called "Moon Shooter" is known at the Moonlit Fair. Interesting challenges like this are meant for Chixia... and you!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
A challenge called "Moon Shooter" is known at the Moonlit Fair. Interesting challenges like this are meant for Chixia... and you!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, Rover! Ya wanna give this a shot?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you're lookin' at it. Moon Shooter. Been helping Qingxi test out the new targets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just beat my personal best, but.. I'm still nowhere near the all-time record.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I mean, that record holder hit multiple targets with one shot, can't top that. It's crazy how they pulled it off.

Options.PlotLineKey: You're very good at it already.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ready for the real deal, Chixia? I've made some intense Moon Shooter challenges just for the pros.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I ran out of space here at the Fair... So I moved them to a safe area nearby.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These aren't like the ones you tried at my stall—trust me, they'll be the craziest challenge of your life!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jeepers! I gotta try that out!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go ahead, knock yourself out. You can even help me get a feel for the difficulty while you're at it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are we waiting for, {PlayerName}? Let's go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Over here, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe... I hope Qingxi's not gonna disappoint.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...That's it? Welp, Qingxi was right about these being harder than the ones back at the stall. Just a teeny bit though.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's already pretty difficult for the average folk.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Guess we'll have to look forward to Qinxi's ultimate challenge. She's definitely saving the best for last.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She must have tougher challenges for us. Instructor Yhan wouldn't have asked her to train the rookies otherwise.

Options.PlotLineKey: And that's exactly what you want, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright. She's got me all fired up now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bring it on, Qinxi. I'm game for whatever you're gonna throw at me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...There it is, Rover!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time to give this ultimate challenge a spin!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice. Haven't broken so much sweat while target shooting in a long time. Ha. Not bad, Qingxi. Not bad at all...

Options.PlotLineKey: That's way over the top for an amusement game.
That was so intense my hands were shaking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That last challenge was really something, huh? But we made it through either way! Gimme five, Rover. Yeah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chixia raises her hand in excitement as she gives Rover a high five.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha. When we team up, we're unstoppable!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C'mon! Back to Qingxi's!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're back. Looks like you managed to beat all the challenges.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Was there ever a doubt?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well? How did it feel, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... If you say so, then it's safe to say these extra challenges are ready for a broader audience.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still a bit on the easier side, huh? Which means... I'll need to turn it up a notch.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha. Even Rover thinks they're too much of a challenge. I see, then I'll probably have to tone it down a bit...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, Qingxi. You forgetting someone?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pfft. Ya think? Oh, I know what you're thinkin', all right—

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy as shooting fish in a barrel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: H-How'd you guess that?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Care to give me some pointers on pistol training, Chixia?

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who knows? Maybe we can promote your skills among the Rangers!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tips? It's just hard work, hard work, and more hard work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just hard work? Hmm... That's not much advice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, then, lemme think... I'd say we also need the "heart of a hero."

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Gotta be quick on the draw to protect the innocent, and shoot with absolute precision to stop evil. As a hero, I must strive for perfection!

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: True, having a strong will to protect is just as crucial.

Dialogues.Speaker: Qingxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. I'll be sure to tell the instructor what you said today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't mention it, Qingxi!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh... By the way, {PlayerName}, you found any good stuff to eat?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Moon Shooter game had me all wrapped up. Totally forgot I came here for some snacks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now with all that done and dusted, my stomach's starting to grumble...

Options.PlotLineKey: There are plenty of food stalls.
You should give "Fish Balls with Spicy Gravy" a try!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice... Food Hunter Chixia is ready!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fish Balls with Spicy Gravy... It's got me drooling just saying that name!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wanna come with me, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah! All right. Snack time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okie dokie! Enjoy the Moonlit Fair, {PlayerName}!
